name: Amelia Parseghian
text: I hadn’t been to Pizza Hut in many years. It’s the same. Michael was holding it down at this location - he appeared to be working by himself and was very polite on the phone and in person, and the pizza was well done.

name: Joshua Tree
text: Pizza was good and fresh, bread sticks we're good as well. Staff was friendly and service was prompt. Restaurant is definitely showing its age, bathroom is run down and falling apart. The biggest downsize is the cost of food. 45 dollars for …More

name: Sammi bostwick
text: Took over an hour and 45 minutes to get my food when told it would take 40-50 minutes then the driver expected a tip when he took his sweet time with the college kids. Maybe they tipped him by getting him high and that's why it took him an hour to get to me when I'm 4 minutes away.

name: Chris L
text: Great food, not quite the best attitude from the staff. But the food was at least good.

name: anthony sweetay
text: As one of the current emplyees i regret to inform everyone that the store has closed and will not be reopening. That being said thank everyone for their years of being customers.

name: Ryan McCartney
text: Nice wait staff and decent pizza, but the restaurant itself smelled moldy and unclean. Now I understand why we were the only customers there for dinner at 6:30.

name: June Luu
text: I recommended for take out during pandamic. Great food, really hot and fresh. We ordered chicken wings with personal pizza. Love so much.

name: Mike F
text: Was up in New York for vacation and Love pizza hut normally, but can't say the same for this location. The man who served me was rude, our food was cold, and after we purchased a 2 liter of soda we were told we weren't gonna get it because they didn't have anymore.

name: Al G
text: Great staff - essential workers who perform their duties with a smile, even in a pandemic.

text: Overpriced and not up to Pizza Hut at all. Dry, no taste, very little sause and hardly any cheese. Not doing it again.

name: Bryan Hall
text: I've only left one negative review and it was well earned. I checked in to see what Pizza hut was up to these days. I last ordered from them, same owners now, in 2008. I see in current reviews that nothing has changed. That is simply …More

name: Gary Tarasco
text:
The most delightful server I have encountered in years. Been at that location
25 years and is always smiling. A refreshing break from the norm.

name: Claire Hebbard
text: Lunch buffet. Good service. Same staff for 30+ years.

name: Melissa DeFord
text: The food was good however they were severely understaffed. There were only two workers on and at one point one had left for a delivery. The poor guy that was still there was trying to do everything. As a result, the service was slow and not everything was correct. We also asked for a pitcher of water for the kids that we never received.

name: Inge Azpillaga
text: Worse place on Earth. It is out dated and the service is aweful.

text: This is the best Pizza Hut I've ever been to through the years in my travels.  It's always clean, the salad bar is always good and fresh

name: Chuck Reed
text: Server was good. But when you offer a lunch buffet, and it is lunchtime, you would think that you would have food on the buffet table. Lots of customers, ALMOST NO FOOD ON THE BUFFET TABLES. Certainly did not get our money worth.

name: Kevin Michalski
text: So, the pizza at Pizza Hut is delicious.  It always is.  They even had a great Saturday night deal, where any 2 medium pizzas would cost $15.10 with tax included.  Perfect for 3 people dining on a budget.  However, this Pizza Hut building …More

text: Due to recall, no romaine on salad bar, couldn't substitute iceberg, had filled lettuce bowl with baby spinach,  but had run out of that. Truck with more spinach due tomorrow-maybe. No offer to reduce price, so we asked -not authorized to …More

text: Dude I get it. I trust Pizza Hut as much as the next unsuspecting victim. But the service, not the food itself, was not acceptable. Gives us wrong order. Also gave us their copy of the receipt. On our way to return it now. Food was 4/10. My stomach is upset.

text: This is the worst pizza hut ever. There alleged bonesless wings were petrified baked frozen nuggets. The service was just awful.

text: Always seems understaffed here. The layout is a bit, bare but the steelers themed decorations around the place are the opposite of bare.

text: The food is great and the staff is nice but their seats and tables are kinda falling apart 😬 I loved eating here with my family but if one of my kids even slightly leaned on the table it threated to flip over!

text: Fantastic!!!!!!!!!!! Love the great deals! And they make the pizza exactly how you order it! I litterally drive to this one from Watkins glen because ours isn’t good !!
